alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Toole, Central, Eastern Pondera, Liberty; Lewis and Clark National Forest Rocky Mountain District-Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 22 at 1:18PM MDT until July 25 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 112 AND 114... The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Monday afternoon through Monday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Eastern Glacier/Toole/Central/Eastern Pondera/Liberty and Lewis and Clark National Forest Rocky Mountain District-Rocky Mountain Front. * WINDS...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 14 percent. * IMPACTS...Any new fire starts could be difficult to contain.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. A combination of gusty winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will create high fire growth potential. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Fire Weather Watch.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Toole, Central, Eastern Pondera, Liberty; Lewis and Clark National Forest Rocky Mountain District-Rocky Mountain Front
